text: Iʙrohim va kasone, ki ʙo vaj ʙudand, on goh ki ʙa qavmi xud guftand, ki mo az sumo va az on ci cuz Xudoi jakto meparasted, ʙezorem va sumoro kofir mesumorem va mijoni movu sumo hamesa dusmanivu ʙadʙini xohad ʙud, to vaqte ki ʙa Xudoi jakto imon ʙijovared, ʙarojaton neku muqtadoe (pesvoe) ʙudand. Magar on goh ki Iʙrohim padarasro guft, ki ʙaroi tu ʙaxsois metalaʙam, zero nametavonam azoʙi Xudoro az tu daf' kunam. Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙar Tu tavakkal kardem va ʙa Tu ruj ovardem va ʙa sui tust ʙozgast
